warnings: Warnings For external use only Do not use in eyes When using this product if in eyes, rinse promptly and thoroughly with water discontinue use if irritation and redness develop Stop use and ask a doctor if skin irritation or redness occurs for more than 72 hours Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
dosage_administration: Directions wet skins and apply a small amount on hands an forearms scrub well, rinse thoroughly and dry
indications: Uses for handwashing to decrease bacteria on the skin
